children.name: Login Test Suite
TC262- Verify that app version is shown on the login screen
TC629- To verify app able to login by long press on hiver logo
TC630- To verify long press on hiver logo, showing the popup for quick login
TC261- Verify that user gets a screen which information about what hiver will access in Google account
TC278- Verify that user is shown  ‘No internet connection’ hello bar at all times inside the app if there’s no internet
Left and Right Panel Test Suite
TC724 - To verify profileAvatar.
TC725 - To verify right drawer panel  is accessible when user clicks on "Profile Avatar" in home page.
TC726 - To verify "Right Drawer" panel is closed when user clicks on "Close" icon.
TC727 - To verify "Right Drawer Panel" is getting closed if user clicks anywhere outside the panel.
TC729 - Verify that on clicking on "Help and Feedback" in "Right Drawer Panel", compose mail page is opened with "support id" as default in "To" field
TC730 - Verify that clicking on Product updates option, opens up web page where user can check the latest updates in app.
TC731 - Verify that user is able to logout of the app using logout button.
TC732 - Verify that user is able to access " help & feedback" even with no internet connection.
TC733 - To verify user is able to "Logout" from app in "No Internet" scenario.
TC734 - To verify "Left Drawer Panel" is displayed if user clicks on "Left Menu" button.
TC735 - To verify "Compose" page is displayed when clicked on "Compose" button in left drawer panel.
TC736 - Verify that on Compose mail page , the "From field" is empty.
TC738 - To verify user lands on respective SM/Inbox chosen from "Left Drawer Panel"
TC741 - Verify user should have the option to select any other SM email(or their alias) or my personal email in the From field
TC742 - Verify that user gets an error message on trying to send an email with empty "From" field
TC743 - Verify user should be able to add Subject, To, Cc, Bcc fields
TC744 - Verify that user is able to send the email successfully.
TC746 - Verify that users are able to insert email templates (To be executed after email templates are developed for Mobile )
TC748 - Verify that after sending an email through compose, user should be landed back to preserved SM-View state with the sending toast & sent toast.
TC749 - Verify if email is composed and sent via an SM alias, its behaviour should be same as web i.e it should be closed by default and not assign
TC752 - Verify that user is able to compose and send an email with large content
TC761 - Verify that user is able to access Compose and help&feedback even with no internet connection
TC255 - Verify that user is able to compose and send an email with inline images
Inbox Test Suite
TC631 - To verify users land on "Gmail Inbox" inbox category on very first login.
TC632 - To verify users are able too see Default inbox type with the categories - Inbox, Primary, Social,Promotions,Updates,Forums
TC633 - To verify users are able to switch between the categories present for "Gmail Inbox"
TC635 - To verify the "Category View" button for 5 default categories shows count of unread conversation present under them.
TC638 - To verify that the time or date information on a conversation
TC639 - To verify that the "Profile Letter" of the user is shown who started the conversation under default inbox categories.
TC640 - To verify Subject line
TC641 - To verify that snippet of last sent email is visible in the conversation list.
TC642 - To verify thread count is shown beside each conversation if the count of mails present in the same is 2 or more than 2.
TC645 - To verify When the user enters into a conversation, all unread emails are expanded by default, and the rest are collapsed
TC646 - To verify each mail in conversation should have the option to reply/reply all or forward
TC647 - To verify each mail in conversation should have the option to reply/reply all or forward
TC648 - To verify users are not able to create "Shared Draft" using hiver menu present in compose section.
TC649 - To verify user are able to mark conversation as "unread" from the app.
TC650 - To verify that "Tag icon on top, tag chips, assignee, status and activity buttons" are not part of the personal conversation thread list screen.
TC652 - To verify user is able to navigate to search screen from default categories present under Gmail Inbox.
TC653 - To  verify user is able to switch between header tabs in the search screen.
TC654 - To verify user is able to search for the conversation present in "Gmail Inbox" from search screen
TC658 - To verify when user is searching within Gmail inbox, the search results should only contain email exchange data
TC660 - To verify "Gmail Inbox" chip is displayed for personal conversation if user searches for conversation in "All Inboxes"
TC662 - To verify proper chips are being displayed for the conversation part of both "SMs and Inbox" present in searched results
TC663 - To verify users are able to open the conversation from the searched results for "Gmail Inbox".
TC664 -To verify proper error message is displayed if user searches for conversation using wrong keywords.
TC666 - To verify user is taken back to "Gmail List" view screen/page by clicking "Cancel" button in search screen/page.
TC669 - To verify there is an option to add the conversation to a shared mailbox for the mails present under "gmail inbox"
TC674 - To verify user is able to add conversations under "Gmail inbox" to SM he is part of.
TC676 - To verify conversation is not getting added to SM if user "Cancels" the confirmation.
TC686 - To verify hiver menu would only have the option to add email templates and not create a shared draft.
TC687 - To verify the Gmail inbox conversation list view with shared conversation mails
TC647 - To verify users are able to "reply/reply all/forward" the mails available at a conversation level.
TC651 - To verify when user open any shared conversation (from Inbox/SM listview), he/she should be able to view SM info (assignee, staus,tags etc) on this conversation.
TC655 - To verify users will be able to see all the SMs to which the conversation belongs to.
TC656 - To verify users can switch to a different SM on the conversation thread screen
TC657 - To verify users can switch to different SMs and able to see the assignee and other informations
TC659 - To verify users can switch to different SMs and able to see the assignee and other informations
TC668 - To verify app will not support to add another SM when the conversation already added to one particular SM
TC670 - To verify conversation menu (three dots) contains two options (mark as unread, remove conversation from SM) when user selects any shared conversation form inbox
TC672 - To verify confirmation popup before removing the conversation
TC673 - To verify remove the conversation from SM
TC675 - To verify cancel option on the confirmation popup
TC677 - To verify confirmation popup should not show once the user checks the "don’t show again" option
TC678 - To verify remove conversation from <SM name>”
TC97 - Verify that user is able to see subject line of the conversation
TC99 - Verify that if any email is unread in the conversation, it should expand automatically for the user to read.
TC104 - Verify that user can see the attachement icon in the list view of mail.
Quoted Text
TC559 - To verify "Show Quoted Text" is visible in the conversation thread list page.
TC560 - To verify "Show quoted text" is clickable in conversation thread list page.
TC561 - To verify "Hide Quoted Text" is clickable and the entire conversation thread under quoted text should collapse if user clicks the same
Conversation Search
TC522 - To verify "Search" icon is visible in the homepage of the app.
Permalinks
TC690 - To verify "Permalink icon" is not visible/present for only Gmail Inbox conversations.
Forward
TC587 - To verify users are able to "Forward" the entire conversation present in the thread.
Activity Panel and Notes
TC28- Verify that the app remembers the last accessed section between Notes/Activities in conversation footer
TC29- Verify if the user has switched from Notes to Activity or vice versa on Activities Panel, panel should maintain the same state when the user visits the same screen next time.
TC30- Verify that the count of all activities/notes is shown on the conversation footer and in Activities Panel
TC31- Verify that the app remembers the last accessed section between Notes/Activities in conversation footer.
TC32- Verify that user can swipe left from All Activities and come to conversation screen
TC33- Verify that user can swipe right from conversation screen to All Activities/Notes screen
TC37- Verify that user is able to add a new note or reply to existing note
TC38- Verify that user is able to select between All Activities/Notes
TC39- Verify that user is able to see the count of notes on the footer of the conversation as well as on Activity Panel.
TC40- Verify that user is able to see all the conversations including the users own conversations in Activity Panel
TC43- Verify that if a note is a response to an existing note, user should be able to see only one level of threading
TC44- Verify that user should see only 2 lines of parent notes and the commentors name for context
TC45- Verify that if a note is longer than a particular height  it should be truncated with a cue ‘See more’ which can be tapped on to view the entire note
TC55- Verify that user is able to add a new note or reply to an existing note
TC56- Verify that user is able to @mention people on note
TC52- Edited Note: Verify that whenever a note is edited, user can see the relevant message
TC57- Verify that note goes to pending if the internet goes off
TC51- Delete Note: Verify that whenever a note gets deleted, relevant message is shown to the user
TC61- Verify that placeholder text is shown after deleting notes
TC65- Verify that user is able to edit their own notes
TC287- Verify that if the user has switched to Notes in Activity Screen, Conversation footer should contain Notes count
TC285- Verify that count of activity gets updated on changing status of an email
TC284- Verify that count of activity gets updated on sending a note from activity screen and then on swiping right
TC72- Verify that user can add any notes with special character
TC75- Verify that user can mark the notification as unread/read in notification centre
TC60- Verify that user is able to delete only their notes
TC63- Verify that notification of @mention note is update if the note is deleted
TC70- Verify that if any "new" user is mentioned as a part of an edit, the user must be notified
TC289- Verify that user is taken to activity screen on opening a notification related to activity
TC74- Verify that notification is sent to the user if anyone replies to the note of that user
TC71- Verify that content of notification is changed when the note is edited
TC283- Verify that user is able to swipe to conversation screen from activity screen
TC27- Verify that user can see the Activity timeline pertaining to a conversation
Assignee
TC367 - To verify "Unassign" tag is not being displayed when mail/mails are not assigned.
TC368 - To verify on tapping "ME(Current user name)", the conversation should be assigned to current user.
TC369 - To verify if user clicks on "Unassign" , the conversation should get unassigned from the current user.
TC371 - To verify proper toast message is being displayed when conversation is being Unassigned from a particular user.
TC372 - To verify keyboard is popped up when user clicks on the "Search starts with" text field in "Assign to" drop down/popup
TC374 - To verify that dropdown list is closed if user clicks outside the list of "Assign to" usernames.
TC376 - To verify name of the user to whom mail is conversation is assigned is displayed in the conversation page.
TC377 - To verify search results are displayed when user enters valid username in the "Assign to" search field.
TC378 - To verify search result are displayed if the list contains valid characters given as inputs in search field.
TC379 - To verify proper error message is displayed when user tries to search with invalid input.
TC380 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "First Name" of the username.
TC381 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "Last Name" of the username.
TC441 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "Last Name" of the username.
TC366 - To verify "Search" tab opens on click of "Assign to" text in Conversation page.
Status & Views
TC435 - To verify user is able to see all the other "Views" option present when he clicks on the view floater button
TC436 - To verify user is able to switch between the views of the particular SM.
TC438 - To verify if user switches between the SM, the views list and count should be according the SM chosen
TC442 - To verify the default status of the new mail added to SM is "Open".
TC443 - To verify user is able to expand the "Status" module by clicking on the same in conversation thread list page.
TC444 - To verify the "Status" drop up modal in expanded state is closed if user clicks outside the expanded state anywhere on the screen
TC445 - To verify user is able to change the status of the mail added to SM from any of the views present.
TC447 - To verify the "Status" modal is still in expanded state if user closes the app or puts the app in background and opens the app again..
TC434 - To verify Unassigned "View" floater button is present along with the views count when user logs in the app every time by default
